FilterItemPortable.Name: Efetivas
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.ABRANGENCIA = 'R' AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTO FROM CM_ITENS B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C WHERE B.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.ABRANGENCIA = 'R' AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTO FROM CM_ITENS B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C WHERE B.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Previs√µes
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.ABRANGENCIA = 'O') AND (A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTOFINANCEIRO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAENTREGA B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C, CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D WHERE B.ORDENSCOMPRAITENS = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = D.HANDLE AND D.HANDLE = @CAMPO(HANDLE)) OR A.HANDLE IN (SELECT D.DOCUMENTOFINANCEIRO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D WHERE D.HANDLE = @CAMPO(HANDLE))) </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.ABRANGENCIA = 'O') AND (A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTOFINANCEIRO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAENTREGA B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C, CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D WHERE B.ORDENSCOMPRAITENS = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = D.HANDLE AND D.HANDLE = @CAMPO(HANDLE)) OR A.HANDLE IN (SELECT D.DOCUMENTOFINANCEIRO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D WHERE D.HANDLE = @CAMPO(HANDLE))) </Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
